name: Social Medicine
tag_list: global-community-health, group-health, health-chat, health-forum, health-news, health-partners, medical-blogs, medical-dictionary-online, medical-symptoms, social-medicine, social-networking-sites, symptom-checker, womens-health
overview:
Social Medicine is about connecting people. It is designed to help those dealing with particular illnesses, help them share their thoughts, experiences, knowledge and other various aspects of their condition, with others who are having a similar experience.

Social Medicine is a great example in how social networking can improve your health and focuses on bridging the gap of patient-to-patient communication. Social-medicine.org has multiple patient focused social networking platforms, designed to help individuals dealing with particular illnesses, help share their thoughts, experiences, and knowledge with others who experience the same condition. Its emphasis is on connecting people globally and has all the social networking features and functionality expected, such as personalizing profiles, joining communities, making friends, uploading your photos and videos, writing on walls, chatting live to others whether itâ€™s one-to-one or in groups, and commenting on blogs written within the communities.

Social Medicine is catered to all who care about helping people. Its focus is on connecting people, mainly patients; however doctors, nurses and specialists can also use the platform to connect with patients. It opens many doors for mothers and fathers, to all others who have someone close, who suffers from an illness.
